#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int lcm(int x,int y)
{ 
	return ((x*y)/__gcd(x,y));
}
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int n,gcd_all,gcd_den,lcm_all;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	int num[n],d[n];
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		scanf("%d",&num[i]);
		scanf("%d",&d[i]);
	}
	gcd_all=num[0];
	lcm_all=d[0];
	long ans=1;
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		gcd_all=__gcd(gcd_all,num[i]);
		lcm_all=lcm(lcm_all,d[i]);
	}
	printf("%d/%d",gcd_all,lcm_all);
	return 0;
}
